nodes.text: Qazadi was a Black Sun Vigo who lived around the time of the Battle of Yavin. In 0 ABY, he traveled to Wukkar to both verify the safety of Prince Xizor's blackmail files stored in Avrak Villachor's vault and to possibly "recruit" new resources for Black Sun. He was something of a recluse during Festival of Four Honorings preferring to view the sites from his private room in Marblewood Estate. During the heist led by Han Solo on the mansion, Qazadi was killed by Boba Fett disguised as the deceased Eanjer Kunarazti.
